<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Investment  request">cd2bced097d571102d7ebf56f053af85</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>action on varialbe</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    // Copyright KARL STORZ SE & CO KG
  // Author Gerald Fuchs
  // Created: 2023-09-12 14:53:54
  // Description:
  // ''
  
  debugger;
  var req = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
  req.addQuery("sys_id", g_form.getValue("number")); // find the REQ record
  req.query();
  // if REQ record found then set value
  if (req.next()) {
    req.requested_for =g_form.getValue("requested_for");
    req.update();
  }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-12 11:13:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>902e4ea89795b1102d7ebf56f053af6e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>action on varialbe</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Fuchsclan Test" source="x_557984_fuchsclan">57227043974131102d7ebf56f053afdd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Fuchsclan Test">57227043974131102d7ebf56f053afdd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_902e4ea89795b1102d7ebf56f053af6e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-12 16:22:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
